Articles.Content:
> 
> Someone get this on the next Modding Monday.
> **PLEASE GET THIS ON MODDING MONDAY**

Why would you expose this abomination to the unsuspecting world, you fiend?!

> 
> My poor eyes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Where we're going we don't need OKAY OKAY I'LL STOP NOW.
I have to know. Since the mouth's don't line up. What does it look like when a Franken Scott Kerbal opens its mouth?
Thank you. Thank you so much. Valentina Tershkova and Neil Armstrong's nose will be so proud.

> 
> I have to know. Since the mouth's don't line up. What does it look like when a Franken Scott Kerbal opens its mouth?

[You're welcome](http://pre12.deviantart.net/601c/th/pre/i/2014/100/c/4/yog_sothoth_by_darthivann-d7dx73u.png)
I'll get Illectro...
Yeah, someone get Scott to at least comment on this, this is hilarious

Um......I really don't know what to say......

**I just can't stop looking at it and laughing!!**

Great work. I'm sure Scott's wife would appreciate this....I think........... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Yeah, someone get Scott to at least comment on this, this is hilarious

I'd like to point out to both this poster and several previous ones that I'd already pointed out to some other poster and some other previous posters that Scott has already commented in this thread.

Oh God Why.

Also, Scott needs to do a mod review of this.
AAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH! i... i... i CANT RESPOND TO THIS!
It's.... It's Beautiful.....

My sides have reached orbit

Other than this horrifying version

Can you please make a version without scaring my brain tissue?

> 
> What have we learned here? Scott Manley's face does not translate well to kerbal facial structure.

His hairdo does, however. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
What....the.... even... heck...did I just see.....

> 
> Oh God Why.
> Also, Scott needs to do a mod review of this.

He has already commented, and said he has too many young viewers.

well not only the heat is ruining our sleep.

Now we'll all have nightmares. :-)
I need a lobotomy. Downloading now.....
\*vomits\*
This is why we can't have nice thing.

I don't know why are you guys complaining about this.

**This is art at its finest! It's BEAUTIFUL!**
Think you may have to make a KSP streamer update ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
This is getting less and less disturbing and more and more funny as I look at it more and more.
Seen can't be unseen

Please don't take this wrong, but I am granting this the title of Worst Mod Ever.

No offense of course ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
